elements.name: question1
elements.title: What are the requirements to be met in order to create a unique, non-interchangeable story that involves the listeners and stimulates their intrinsic motivation?
choices: L'histoire est le fondement de l'identité.
The history of the company is presented in the form of an axe of time.
Its history makes the company and its services tangible and lively.
History creates a positioning that attracts attention and is distinct from the competition.
L'histoire doit être la plus concrète possible, sans grandes émotions.
History shows the auditors and listeners who, in the ideal case, make a positive purchase decision.
L'histoire contient le plus de détails possible afin de transmettre beaucoup d'informations.
correctAnswer: L'histoire est le fondement de l'identité.
Its history makes the company and its services tangible and lively.
History creates a positioning that attracts attention and is distinct from the competition.
History shows the auditors and listeners who, in the ideal case, make a positive purchase decision.
